data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
Backward moves one backward. Forward moves would be to the left. Taking the opposite direction of what one was facing would be to the right. So, the answer is yes.

To turn left you take 5 steps. To return to the starting point, do 7 steps repeating 7 steps + 1 step = 15 steps. So, the answer is Yes.
